items.sentence: Tom said that he hated the last song we sang last night.
Tom said that he planned to stick around school all day.
Tom said that he was going to buy some flowers for Mary.
What would\'ve happened to Tom if he hadn\'t left early?
It was dark, so Tom had trouble reading the street sign.
Tom knew Mary was going to be mad at him for doing that.
Tom had a week to finish this, but he didn\'t finish it.
Tom had no idea that Mary couldn\'t speak French at all.
Tom has been more successful at losing weight than Mary.
Do you think Tom would\'ve wanted us to do that for him?
